originalText: fo_faceless
Start Element
centaur
::The quadrupedal Faceless approaches as soon as he notices you. His weapon is raised, aimed at you, yet he seems reluctant to immediately open fire, instead opting for an emotionless stare.::
::The synthesized voice greets you.:: Did you locate the item?
Our business here is done.
We have told you already - there is nothing to be found here. Begone.
context.npc_fofaceless_met
context.npc_fofaceless_met
::Give him time to see what his intentions are.::
::Attack!::
Is this what you're after? ::Show him the Acorn.::

The Tchortists recently stole a peculiar item from one of Coretech's research facilities. It looked like a bluish-gray polyhedron with unusual symbols on its faces. Is that the thing you're looking for?

The item you seek used to be in possession of a man called Cornell, the leader of the Acid Hunters, a gang from Core City. However, he does not have it anymore. All I know is that Foundry is not the place to be searching for the item.

The item you seek is in possession of a man called Cornell. He's the leader of the Acid Hunters gang which usually hangs out in Core City. At this point, it's highly unlikely that the item is anywhere near Foundry.
The leaders of Foundry want to know why you are here.
I've decided to help with locating your stolen property. What was it exactly?
I wanted to talk to you about the item you're looking for.

If it's that Cube you're looking for, it used to be in possession of a man called Cornell, the leader of the Acid Hunters, a gang from Core City. However, he does not have it anymore. All I know is that Foundry is not the place to be searching for the item.

If it's that Cube you're looking for, I can tell you now that this item is in possession of a man called Cornell. He's the leader of the Acid Hunters gang which usually hangs out in Core City. At this point, it's highly unlikely that the item is anywhere near Foundry.
Can I ask you a question?
Sorry for bothering you. I'll be on my way.
::He holds you at gun point silently, and for a while nothing happens. His companions stand weapons-ready as well while gesturing something between themselves.::
::He looks at the sealed container.:: Open it.
context.npc_fofaceless_acornPath
::The Faceless is taken aback by your words.:: Providing you're telling the truth, we have no reason to remain here.
fo_FacelessRecon
No, we will answer no more questions.
Then we have nothing to say to you.
::He pauses briefly, as if unsure how to proceed.:: Something of value has been stolen from us. We believe it might have found its way to their community.
We may not tell you this, but the item is very distinct. People who came in contact with it will certainly remember it.

::After a short pause, he responds.:: 

How do you know about this?
No.

::He then reaches for something on the inside of the chin of his mask, and soon after that you can hear a crude synthesized voice.:: 

Identify yourself.
plot.xpbl_acorn
Take this as a sign of our appreciation for your assistance in this matter. ::He hands you what looks to be a high quality power core.::
If you can help us locate the missing item, we will be on our way.
Inquire with the local merchants; the thief who stole it might have attempted to sell it to them.
This is no concern of yours.

::His raspy response comes after a tense delay.:: 

This is not what we're after.
fo_FacelessRecon
What you say did occur. ::He pauses briefly, as if unsure how to proceed.:: Something of value has been stolen from us. We believe it might have found its way to the community nearby.
What is your business here?
Can you describe what was stolen, then?
English

In that case, I've learned that something rather unusual used to be in possession of a man called Cornell, the leader of the Acid Hunters, a gang from Core City. However, he does not have it anymore. All I know is that Foundry is not the place to be searching for the item.
English

In that case, the item you seek has to be in possession of a man called Cornell. He's the leader of the Acid Hunters gang which usually hangs out in Core City. At this point, it's highly unlikely that the item is anywhere near Foundry.
English
I'll get back to looking, then.
English
Sorry, I cannot do this.
The matter is very simple: We will retrieve this item. Those who would stop us from doing so will be dealt with.
While we appreciate your assistance, we must advise you not to investigate this matter further or interfere with our operations near Core City or elsewhere.
To you as well.
English
Is this what you're after? ::Show him the Acorn.::
If you can help us locate the missing item, we will be on our way.
context.npc_fofaceless_acornPath
Very well. Leave us then.
Our business here is done.
There's nothing for you to take here. Be on your way.
Your answer is not acceptable. We will give you one more chance.
And I will tell you again this is no business of yours.
::Attack!::
